items.name: Mini Heroes Wiki
items.title: Mini Heroes Wiki
items.headline: Welcome to the Mini Heroes Wiki!
items.desc: Welcome to the Mini Heroes Wiki! This Wiki is all about the MMO Castaway game, Mini Heroes. This includes Pets, Armour, Weapons, Spell Types, Spells, Enemies and Dungeons. Mini Heroes is an all new multiplayer, adventure game experience. Battle monsters and explore dungeons with friends. Raise pets and Craft over 1000 unique items!
